page.title: 11A SALESMAN LIVING IN CRADLEY
page.content: He has lived in Cradley for seven years.He was born in Birmingham then moved to Worcester where the houses were cheaper than in Birmingham.After this he moved to Cradley.He says there are many improvements that could be made such as a better bus sevice,a better village pub,an adventure playgrond for children and also an active youth club to keep teenagers out of mischief.He does not work in Cradley as his work takes him all over Britain and sometimes abroad.He says schools of today are very different because we have computers and do many more subjects.The thing he hates most of all is the possibility of a nuclear war.He says the present day fashions give him a good laugh.
